OOC: THAT'S IT!!!!

BIC:  Thirst recieves on laser on each shoulder, but counters as 
flames leap out of his mouth the same way they did with SS on Luzbel.

OOC:  Please note since Void didn't agree to be Thirst's slave instead 
of altering him into an incredible powerful bot painlessly it'll 
slowly burn him into a pile of scrap and it'll attach to him so he 
can't just run out of the inferno.

BIC:  And fires 8 plasma blasts in the general direction of the 
others.
